metadata.description: Official Clix MCP Server providing documentation search, SDK code search, and CLI integration for seamless mobile SDK development

plugins.name: clix-mcp-server
plugins.description: A Model Context Protocol server enabling AI agents to deliver real-time, trustworthy Clix documentation and SDK code examples. Provides documentation search with semantic ranking, SDK source code search across iOS/Android/Flutter/React Native, and CLI installation guides.
